column5: Land at Thorpe Road; Melton Mowbray
column11: not owned by a public authority
column19: The site is adjacent to the main town of Melton Mowbray. There are good connections to services and facilities and employment and good transport choice to Melton Mowbray town centre including walking and cycling. The site is well contained within the built form. The existing buildings are protected by an Article 4 direction. The principle of development looks acceptable subject to retention of important buildings and high quality design to protect the local heritage asset. The site is currently being marketed.
